text: Raman Sharma (5 September 1945 - 6 January 1999) was an Indian cricket umpire. He stood in one Test match in 1994 and eleven ODI games between 1993 and 1997. Sharma died when the jeep he was driving collided with a bus in 1999. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Indian cricketers
title: Raman Sharma
